channel.title: President
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: Ling and YanHe V5 Update
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Although we have not had a whole lot of news about V5 or new voicebanks, and we have also not heard much about YanHe and Ling getting an update, we do now have confirmation of Ling and YanHe getting a V5 update! In a post on Weibo from Ren Xing Tu(人形兎), the voicebank producer for …

The post Ling and YanHe V5 Update appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Although we have not had a whole lot of news about V5 or new voicebanks, and we have also not heard much about YanHe and Ling getting an update, we do now have confirmation of Ling and YanHe getting a V5 update!

In a post on Weibo from Ren Xing Tu(人形兎), the voicebank producer for Vsinger, we got confirmation of a V5 update for the two Chinese virtual singers!

The Weibo post was as followed:

Many things were delayed due to the virus outbreak, and I went to the company and packed all the voice files home a few days ago. I am lucky that I can stay at home for a long time to continue making V5 voicebanks! I’m already preparing demos. And Ling will have a new Dark, and YanHe will have a new Sweet voicebank, do you have any suggestions about the Chinese name of each one?”

We can’t wait to hear the demos!

The post Ling and YanHe V5 Update appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Meiko and Kaito Life Size Statue Crowdfunding
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
A few days ago, it was announced that crowdfunding for a life size Meiko and Kaito statue would begin soon. Now, we have all the details! It’s a great way to celebrate Meiko and Kaito’s 15th anniversary. Illustration The illustration will be drawn by iXima. At the moment we only have a sketch but the …

The post Meiko and Kaito Life Size Statue Crowdfunding appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A few days ago, it was announced that crowdfunding for a life size Meiko and Kaito statue would begin soon. Now, we have all the details! It’s a great way to celebrate Meiko and Kaito’s 15th anniversary.

Illustration

The illustration will be drawn by iXima. At the moment we only have a sketch but the full illustration will be revealed soon!

Crowdfunding

The crowdfunding will begin on February 17th, 2020, at 17:00 and will close on April 19th, 2020, at 23:59 (times are in JST). There’s plenty of opportunity to gather up some money to help with the crowdfunding!

The crowdfunding itself will take place on the site “ACT NOW” – you will need to register an account. If  you’re interested in registering now, you can do so here!

If the goal amount is reached, Meiko will be unveiled at this years Magical Mirai 2020 and Kaito will be displayed at an official event in 2021. They also plan to have a life size statue of all 6 characters together. If the amount exceeds the goal, the crowdfunding will still be open and all extras will go towards future activities for Meiko and Kaito. Let’s try and get it as high as we can!

Rewards

Of course with every crowdfunding campaign, there are many cool items for our backers!

3000 Yen (Unlimited Slots)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko and Kaito Clear File (one of each)
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)

15,115 Yen (Unlimited Slots)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meiko Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Meiko
  • Meiko Sticker by iXima

15,217 Yen (Unlimited Slots)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kaito Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Kaito Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Kaito
  • Kaito Sticker by iXima

30,000 Yen (Limited to 15)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meiko Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Meiko
  • Two Meiko Stickers by iXima
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand

30, 000 Yen (Limited to 15)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kaito Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Kaito Course Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Kaito Course
  • Two Kaito Course Stickers by iXima
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand

50,000 Yen (Limited to 10)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Meiko Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Meiko Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Meiko
  • Three Meiko Stickers (iXima, V3 Logo and V1 Logo)
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand
  • Magical Mirai 2020 entry in Osaka(8/9th) and a special visit with Meiko Haigō (1 person)
  • Signed Shikishi with your name by Meiko Haigō

50,000 Yen (Limited to 10)

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kaito Course

  • Email updates of all the project’s news and progress
  • Kaito Clear File
  • Sonoca Card (Includes message and the making of the project)
  • 1/10th Acrylic Stand of Kaito
  • Three Kaito Stickers (iXima, V3 Logo and V1 Logo)
  • Original Tokkuri and Ochoko
  • Your name on the Statue stand
  • Magical Mirai 2020 entry in Osaka(8/9th) and a special visit with Naoto Fūga (1 person)
  • Signed Shikishi with your name by Naoto Fūga

Feeling Course (Unlimited)

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Statue name

If you purchase a course that allows you to have your name on the statue along side another course, your name on the figure will be bigger depending on number of people who do so.

The product may differ from what you see on the picture.

Overseas shipment will not be accepted, it is recommended that you use a forwarding service if you wish to do so.

If all limited courses have been purchased, they may add extra during the crowdfunding campaign if there are enough request for more.

Twitter Hashtag

They will be having a dedicated Twitter hashtag that you may use for the event. The hashtag is #MK15th_project  and will be checked everyday in order to make it a community project!

 

Stay tuned to VNN for any update on this project!

Source: Piapro Blog

The post Meiko and Kaito Life Size Statue Crowdfunding appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Winter Wonfes 2020 Recap
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
As we all know, Wonfes is always a big event for us Figure lovers. Not only is there a lot of figures to be seen, but there is definitely a lot of looking around to try and find all of them! Here at VNN, we try to help out with that. Of course, we are …

The post Winter Wonfes 2020 Recap appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
As we all know, Wonfes is always a big event for us Figure lovers. Not only is there a lot of figures to be seen, but there is definitely a lot of looking around to try and find all of them! Here at VNN, we try to help out with that. Of course, we are bound to miss a few ourselves, so feel free to give us a heads up if we miss any!

Figures

Of course, there was a fair amount of scales, figmas, nendos and many more this year! Let’s take a look at some of them that we have found of our favourite virtual singers this year.

Of course, as is standard every year, there were tons of figures to see of our favourite virtual singers!

GoodSmile Racing

GSR is definitely a big part of Miku and wonfes, and of course, it’s a perfect place for them to showcase their cars as well!

We hope you enjoyed our run down of Wonfes 2020 and we look forward to seeing you at the next Wonfes!

If we have missed anything, let us know in the comments!

Photo Sources

Teto, A 1/8th scale figure of Racing Miku 2020, Racing Miku 2019 Thailand Ver., 1/7th scale figure Hatsune Miku: Kentaro Yabuki x osoba, Hatsune Miku: Symphony 2019 Ver, 1/8th scale figure Hatsune Miku: First Dream Ver., 1/7 MIKU EXPO Digital Stars 2020ver., Hatsune Miku BiCuteBunnies ver., Miku Prize Figures, figma Racing Miku: 2020 ver, figma of Sakura Miku, Nendoroid Racing Miku 2020, Nendoroid Doll of Hatsune Miku, Nendoroid of Snow Miku 2.0, Hatsune Miku V4X, Desktop Singer Series, Mini Figure Series, Rin and Len Tokyo Cartoony, Racing Miku 2013 Rd.4 SUGO

The post Winter Wonfes 2020 Recap appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Exclusive Items in Toreba
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Toreba will feature exclusive Miku items for two consecutive months in limited quantities! What is Toreba? Toreba allows you to remotely play real crane games through the internet. Any prizes you have won can be shipped to your place. Replay videos may also be uploaded, allowing you to watch your previous games and observe games …

The post Hatsune Miku Exclusive Items in Toreba appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Toreba will feature exclusive Miku items for two consecutive months in limited quantities!

What is Toreba?

Toreba allows you to remotely play real crane games through the internet.
Any prizes you have won can be shipped to your place.
Replay videos may also be uploaded, allowing you to watch your previous games and observe games played by others.

For more information on what the game is, you can check out the English page and website here!

Items

The first item will be available starting January 19th. This item will be a Hatsune Miku Purupuru pudding maker and will be available in pink and white!

The second item on the list, which will be available starting February 2nd, is a Hatsune Miku pillow.

 

Illustration

The illustration was drawn by くらしきあお”さん

Please note: Although the game is available in English, these prizes are only available on the Japanese side. 

You can download the game in English on the App Store here as well as the Play Store here.

The Japanese version of the game can be found on the App Store here as well as the Play store here.

Best of luck to everyone!

Links

English website
Japanese website
Piapro article

The post Hatsune Miku Exclusive Items in Toreba appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 Ver. Pre-Orders
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
A new Hatsune Miku figure is now available for pre-order on Animate. The Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 ver. is a 1/8th scale figure and is set to release late February 2020 at a cost of 16,500 JPY.   The figure is based on the illustration of  “Miku Expo Digital Stars 2019 in Hong Kong” …

The post Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 Ver. Pre-Orders appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new Hatsune Miku figure is now available for pre-order on Animate. The Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 ver. is a 1/8th scale figure and is set to release late February 2020 at a cost of 16,500 JPY.

 

The figure is based on the illustration of  “Miku Expo Digital Stars 2019 in Hong Kong” which was illustrated by Tsurushima Tatsumi!

If you would like to pre-order yours, you can head on over to Animate here!

The post Hatsune Miku Digital Stars 2019 Ver. Pre-Orders appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Performance in Shinkalion Movie
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
In the Shinkalion movie, Hatsune Miku will be singing during the concert scene. Although, instead of her name being “First sound(初音)” as we all know it, it will be “Engine Sound(発音)” to fit with the train theme of the anime. She has also made an appearance in the past on the TV anime where she …

The post Hatsune Miku Performance in Shinkalion Movie appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In the Shinkalion movie, Hatsune Miku will be singing during the concert scene. Although, instead of her name being “First sound(初音)” as we all know it, it will be “Engine Sound(発音)” to fit with the train theme of the anime. She has also made an appearance in the past on the TV anime where she is the driver of the H5 Hayabusa who is part of the Shinkansen Ultra Evolution Institute Hokkaido Branch.

You can find Miku singing the theme song of the original series “Shinkansen Henkei Robo Shinkalion anime” titled “Change! Shinkalion”. The vocals were done by Mitchie M and the design by Rella.

We know that the film is set in Hokaido which is an important place to Miku!

We hope to be able to watch it ourselves! How about you?

Source: Shinkalion’s website

Translation Source: Anime News Network

The post Hatsune Miku Performance in Shinkalion Movie appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Kagamine Len and Rin: Winter Live Ver Pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
If you didn’t know yet, both Kagamine Len and Kagamine Rin: Winter Live Ver. Non Scale Figures are available for pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode. If you are like most of us and don’t live in Japan to get one, then now is your chance. The figure is described as the following; From Taito comes …

The post Kagamine Len and Rin: Winter Live Ver Pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
If you didn’t know yet, both Kagamine Len and Kagamine Rin: Winter Live Ver. Non Scale Figures are available for pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode. If you are like most of us and don’t live in Japan to get one, then now is your chance.

The figure is described as the following;

From Taito comes this affordable Prize Figure of Vocaloid Kagamine Len (Winter Live Ver.). He stands 7.1” on a white base in a winter marching band performance uniform as he readies his drumsticks before he takes a step and begins a beat. B’dum b’dum Tss~. Highlights include the metallic gold paint of his outfit, his clearly painted smiling expression, and his 02 rosette.

The figure is currently available for pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode for $19.99 USD regular price or $18,99 USD under TOM Premium Price and it is set to release in February 2020. If you would like to pre-order the figure, you can head over to Tokyo Otaku Mode here!

In case you’ve missed it, you can also pre-order the Rin version for the same price on Tokyo Otaku Mode here! Rin is set to release in January 2020.

Rin’s version is described as;

Kagamine Rin holds her trumpet confidently as she marches along with one hand on her hip during a winter performance in her warm marching band outfit colored with metallic paint details. Measures 7.1”.

Unfortunately, Miku’s version is currently out of stock, so you will need to look elsewhere to get her, but you can find her on Tokyo Otaku Mode Here!

If you do happen to get any of these, send us your photos! We would love to see them!

 

The post Kagamine Len and Rin: Winter Live Ver Pre-order on Tokyo Otaku Mode appeared first on VNN.

item.title: CeVIO CS7 Is on its Way!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
A new update for CeVIO is on its way! At the moment we only have a bit of details but it seems exciting for those of you who have CeVIO! ENG: [Notice]Now, the development of the big next version update of "CeVIO CS7" is coming to a close. Things like 64 bit application, splitting/joining for …

The post CeVIO CS7 Is on its Way! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new update for CeVIO is on its way! At the moment we only have a bit of details but it seems exciting for those of you who have CeVIO!

ENG: [Notice]Now, the development of the big next version update of "CeVIO CS7" is coming to a close.

Things like 64 bit application, splitting/joining for the pitch accent of the talk section, ruby assignment for lines of speech, (1/2)

— uncreepy (@uncreepy_studio) December 5, 2019

ENG: detailed tuning in the time axis for singing quality, automatic splitting of English lyric syllables, etc are planned.

Plans for beta testing are soon, so please look forward to it!! (2/2)

— uncreepy (@uncreepy_studio) December 5, 2019

Special thanks to @uncreepy_studio for the translation!

Stay tuned for more information!

Also thanks to @it_is_i_emoto for bringing it to our attention!

If you think we’ve missed something, feel free to bring it to our attention!

 

The post CeVIO CS7 Is on its Way! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” Character Profiles Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The next band in Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” now has a profile for each character! Let’s take a look at them, shall we? Momoi Airi A former idol who appeared on a variety of shows to gain popularity. Although she was confident and assertive, she had love, passion and pride in her idol work. …

The post Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” Character Profiles Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The next band in Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” now has a profile for each character!

Let’s take a look at them, shall we?

Momoi Airi

A former idol who appeared on a variety of shows to gain popularity. Although she was confident and assertive, she had love, passion and pride in her idol work. Now, for certain reasons, the company has closed and she has retired as an idol.

Hanasato Minori

A pure and dedicated worker. After seeing Kiritani Haruka of the idol group “ASRUN”, she was motivated to pursue being an idol. While going to various auditions, unfortunately she seemed to not be having any luck.

Kiritani Haruka

She is a part of “ASRUN”, an idol group that was popular nationally. She is very charismatic and was also very popular in the group. However, once the group disbanded, she retired from the entertainment business and returned to Miyamasuzaka Girls’ Academy where Minori also attends.

Hinomori Shizuku

Hinomori is still active and is part of the popular idol group “Cheerful X Days”. She has the appearance of a mysterious and charming adult that captivates her fans. However, her group members tend be jealous of her for this reason. She is in the same year as Airi but they also are in the same class together.

Stay tuned for the next group to be revealed!

Official website

The post Project Sekai “MORE MORE JUMP!” Character Profiles Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo X Snow Miku Collaboration
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
We see a lot of collaborations using Snow Miku lately, of course, it is that time of year! With that being said, we can also find Snow Miku cheering on the football team (soccer) Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo.   The new illustration done by へちま features Snow Miku wearing the team jersey with a number 39 …

The post Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo X Snow Miku Collaboration appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
We see a lot of collaborations using Snow Miku lately, of course, it is that time of year! With that being said, we can also find Snow Miku cheering on the football team (soccer) Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo.

 

The new illustration done by へちま features Snow Miku wearing the team jersey with a number 39 on it. Not only that but you can find Snow Miku cheering the team on at the Saporro Dome on November 23rd, 2019. Kickoff starts at 14:00 (Japan time). If you are in the area or can find somewhere to watch the game, make sure to not miss out!

Source: Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo X Snow Miku Collaboration appeared first on VNN.
